features.title: the bed
features.text: Rest easy in a hybrid mattress enveloped in the sophisticated comfort of Frette linen & terry.

features.title: the bath amenities
features.text: Pamper yourself with luxurious Molton Brown bath amenities and Kassatex pool & beach towels.

features.title: the perfect touches
features.text: Enjoy lounging with an LED flat-screen TV, mini fridge, luxury amenities, and grab & go breakfast.

cozy_rooms.title: atlantic king suite
cozy_rooms.text: Our Atlantic King Suite offers one king size bed and one queen sleeper sofa with a spacious studio layout filled with stylishly designed furnishings
details: Spacious studio layout filled with stylishly designed furnishings

cozy_rooms.title: hampton king
cozy_rooms.text: Our Hampton King room offers one king size bed with contemporary furnishings to enlighten your experience.
details: Room with contemporary furnishings to enlighten your experience

cozy_rooms.title: cottage king
cozy_rooms.text: Our quaint cottages offer one king size bed and one queen sleeper sofa specifically built for an intimate group of friends or family.
details: Cottage built for intimate group of friends and family

cozy_rooms.title: atlantic double queen
cozy_rooms.text: Our Atlantic Double Queen room offers two queen size beds with contemporary furnishings to englighten your experience
details: Room with contemporary furnishings to enlighten your experience

cozy_rooms.title: amagansett suite
cozy_rooms.text: Our Amagansett Suite is one of the few true two bedroom & two bathroom suites in the area.  Immerse yourself in this beautifully designed space with items and amenities curated to help you enjoy the Hamptons like it was meant to be experienced.  With one king bedroom and one queen bedroom, adjoined by a spacious open concept living area, dining and kitchen, you will feel like a local.
details: Beautifully designed true two bedroom & two bathroom suite

cozy_rooms.title: accessible hampton king
cozy_rooms.text: Our mobility and hearing accessible Hampton King room offers one king size bed with spacious studio layout filled with elegantly designed furnishings. This room includes a roll-in shower, grab bars, a handheld shower head, and smoke and carbon monoxide detectors with strobes. ADA kits availbel at check-in. If you would like further details regarding the room size and/or fratures of the accessible rooms, we encourage you to call the hote land speak with a Guest Service representative. Any corresponding photos may not reflect the specific acessible room type or room feature.
details: Mobility and hearing accessible room filled with ADA accomodating features
